    • Field Detail

      • controlPoint

        @Nullable
public IGeoPoint controlPoint
        Specifies an optional control point (only applicable to select symbols). If null and a control point is used, the value will be populated on return. If non-null and a control point is not used for the symbol, the value will be cleared on return.

      • shapeType

        @Nullable
public ShapeType shapeType
        The specialized type of the points to be rendered.

      • strokeColor

        public int strokeColor
        The desired stroke color for the symbol. If 0, a default color will be applied based on the symbol code.

      • strokeWidth

        public float strokeWidth
        The desired stroke width for the symbol. Defaults to 1.0f.

      • altitudeMode

        @NonNull
public Feature.AltitudeMode altitudeMode

      • resolution

        public double resolution
        The resolution (meters-per-pixel) of the viewport that the symbol is being rendered to. If Double.NaN, a default resolution will be used based on the extent of the input points.

      • boundingBox

        @Nullable
public Envelope boundingBox
        The bounding box for the viewport that the symbol is being rendered to. If non-null, clippping may be applied to the rendered features. Defaults to null

      • iconSize

        public int iconSize
        Specifies the desired icon size for single-point symbologies. If 0, a default size will be selected. Defaults to {@link 0}

      • fontSize

        public int fontSize
        Specifies the desired font size for labels without explicitly defined font sizes. If 0, a default size will be selected. Defaults to {@link 0}

    • Constructor Detail

      • RendererHints

        public RendererHints()
